Headline: Linden-bound Purple Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Linden-bound Purple Line trains are running with delays due to an obstruction on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Linden-bound Purple Line trains are running with delays due to an obstruction on the tracks.

Purple Line trains will operate locally northbound only.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South/Shore Temporary Reroute at 72nd/Yates

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 71st, 75th, Exchange, 71st and over regular route: due to, police activity near 72nd/Yates.
